name: Zombie Crush VR
description:
Zombie Crush VR - is a dynamic 1st person VR shooter where your main goal would be trying to survive all alone during the zombie apocalypse in your town. There are 3 kinds of weapons to help you break through the weaves of undead and a bunch of quests to complete.


Would you be focused enough to solve them at no time or too scared to think fast when encircled by the crowds of zombies? Explore the entry level of a game at the abandoned subway infected by the odds of zombie and find your way out.




or. . .grab the gun and crush 'em all
